description: Returns a list of AWS re:Post Private private re:Posts in the account with some information about each private re:Post.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token that you use when you request the next set of private re:Posts.

nested_items.name: spaces
nested_items.description: An array of structures that contain some information about the private re:Posts in the account.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: configurationStatus
nested_items.description: The configuration status of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: contentSize
nested_items.description: The content size of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: createDateTime
nested_items.description: The date when the private re:Post was created.

nested_items.name: deleteDateTime
nested_items.description: The date when the private re:Post was deleted.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description for the private re:Post. This is used only to help you identify this private re:Post.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name for the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: randomDomain
nested_items.description: The AWS generated subdomain of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: spaceId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The creation/deletion status of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: storageLimit
nested_items.description: The storage limit of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: tier
nested_items.description: The pricing tier of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: userCount
nested_items.description: The number of onboarded users to the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: userKMSKey
nested_items.description: The custom AWS KMS key ARN that's used for the AWS KMS encryption.

nested_items.name: vanityDomain
nested_items.description: This custom subdomain that you use to access your private re:Post. All custom subdomains must be approved by AWS before use.

nested_items.name: vanityDomainStatus
nested_items.description: This approval status of the custom subdomain.
